description: Replacement of existing aluminium panels and timber louvers with white rendered panels/feature boards on the glazed curtain walls of the building; erection of replacement advertisement signs on all elevations; creation of a new oak finish entrance foyer on the northern elevation; removal of windows on the northern elevation and alterations to the specifications of upper floor windows on other elevations; external reconfiguration of the Car Display Area and customer parking spaces; and internal reconfiguration to accommodate a new dropped ceiling height over a portion of the double height space, involving the removal of the central staircase within the showroom
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (A19-012-SLP100, A19-012-PL001, A19-012-PL002, A19-012-PL003, A19-012-PL004, A19-012-PL000, A19-012-PL101, A19-012-PL102, A19-012-PL103, A19-012-PL104, A19-012, A19-012-BP100 and Design and Access Statement [received on 9 April 2019], Consultation Map [received on 25 April 2019], Parking Strategy Statement [received on 30 May 2019] and A19-002-PL100(Rev.B) [received on 19 June 2019]) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - Before the expiry of three months after commencement of development, full details (including manufacturers specifications) of secure covered cycle parking facilities for the occupants of, and visitors to, the development shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The approved facilities shall conform to current guidance such as the TfL London Cycling Design Standards in design and layout and be fully implemented and be made available for use before the first occupation of the development and thereafter retained for use at all times without obstruction.
